name: Spit Up
effect: Must have used the move "Stockpile" prior to this move, otherwise it will fail. Lose all Stockpile modifiers. For each use of Stockpile expended beyond the first, add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool and afflict the target with a status chosen randomly between Poison, Flinched, and Confused.
description: After storing power, the Pokemon spits that energy at the foe. The user returns to its original size.
